channel.title: git on heman's blog
channel.description: Recent content in git on heman's blog

item.title: How to keep your feature branch in sync with your develop branch
item.description: While using GitFlow, it is a good practice to keep your feature branch in sync with the develop branch to make merging easy. I do the following to keep my feature branch in sync with develop. git checkout develop #if you don't have it already git checkout feature/x #if you don't have it already git pull --all git merge develop You can also do a rebase instead of merge.
